attributes.action: Ban Tractors / Slow Vehicles During Rush Hour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ban the use of Tractors / Slow Moving Vehicles Not Capable of achieving the national speed limit during the Hours of 7am - 9am and 5pm - 7pm. This will increase productivity of the whole country and keep the already conjested roads of Britain moving

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
